bug.author: vincentlux
bug.summary: bug: [quant bert config json not available]
bug.description: It appears that <denchmark-link:https://nlp-architect-data.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/models/transformers/bert-base-uncased.json>https://nlp-architect-data.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/models/transformers/bert-base-uncased.json</denchmark-link> link from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NervanaSystems/nlp-architect/blob/70cb5f3fc1923efeccf98263dd80896bb058f94b/nlp_architect/models/transformers/quantized_bert.py#L59>https://github.com/NervanaSystems/nlp-architect/blob/70cb5f3fc1923efeccf98263dd80896bb058f94b/nlp_architect/models/transformers/quantized_bert.py#L59</denchmark-link> is dead and a config.json file cannot be loaded properly. May I ask if the link can be updated? Thanks!

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vincentlux>@vincentlux</denchmark-link> , thanks for reporting this! We had an issue on AWS that we've just fixed. The config is available now.

This bug is happening again OSError: Couldn't reach server at 'https://nlp-architect-data.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/models/transformers/bert-base-uncased.json' to download pretrained model configuration file.

Please use the recent release from the master branch. We had to update all our links. Thanks <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
